response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it will be equally valuable to you. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, we propose a purchase price of $750,000. We are confident this is a fair and attractive offer, allowing you to secure this masterpiece at a competitive rate while ensuring we receive a generous return for our investment. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of fostering a long-term relationship with you.", "product_price": 750000}
